info.title: Schema of Azure Resource Management events published to Azure Event Grid via Azure Resource Notifications
info.description: Describes the schema of the Azure Resource Management events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

AvailabilityStatusChangedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ResourceNotifications.HealthResources.AvailabilityStatusChanged event.

apiVersion.description: api version of the resource payload

id.description: id of the base resource whose availability status has been impacted

name.description: name of the resource whose availability status has been influenced

type.description: the type of the resource whose availability status has been impacted

properties.description: properties in the resource payload of the resource whose availability status has been impacted

ResourcePayloadForAvailabilityStatusChan.description: details of the properties bag of the resource whose availability status has been influenced

targetResourceId.description: the base resource for which the availability status information is being requested

targetResourceType.description: the type of the base resource

occurredTime.description: The time of the actual event emission by Geneva Health

previousAvailabilityState.description: previous availability status of the base resource

availabilityState.description: current availability status of the base resource

ResourceAnnotatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ResourceNotifications.HealthResources.ResourceAnnotated event.

apiVersion.description: api version of the resource payload

ResourceInfoAboutResourceAnnotatedEvent.description: Resource information related to Annotation event

id.description: id of the base resource for which the annotation event is being emitted

name.description: name of the resource for which the annotation event is being emitted

type.description: the type of the resource for which the annotation event is being emitted

properties.description: properties in the resource payload of the resource whose availability status has been impacted

ResourceInfoAboutResourceAnnotatedEvent.description: Properties bag of the base resource for which the annotation event is being emitted

targetResourceId.description: the base resource for which the resource annotation event is being requested

targetResourceType.description: the type of the base resource for which the annotation event is being emitted

occurredTime.description: The time of the actual annotation event emission by Geneva Health

annotationName.description: The name of the annotation event being emitted. refer - https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/service-health/resource-health-vm-annotation

reason.description: Brief statement on why the resource availability was changed

summary.description: Detailed statement on the cause for change in the resource availability

context.description: Indicates whether resource availability was influenced by Azure or User activity

category.description: Indicates whether resource availability was influenced due to planned or unplanned activity. This is only applicable for platform initiated events
